title: Charred broccoli and spinach fritters with green goddess dressing
directions: toss broccoli with olive oil with and salt and lay on baking sheet. Bake for 18 minutes. Let cool slightly and then chop
wilt spinach, let cool and drain as much water as possible
whisk eggs with cheddar, bread crumbs, onions and garlic. Add broccoli and stir until combined. Season with salt and pepper.
fry about 1/4 cup of mixture formed into a patty in oil for about 3 minutes, turning once. Drain and keep warm
top fritters with green goddess dressing and sprouts
ingredients: 8 oz broccoli florets and peeled stems
